title: Climate Exec Orders, Rep. Bruce Westerman
itunes:title: Climate Exec Orders, Rep. Bruce Westerman
description:
Host: Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Iona College Professor. Guests: Rick Davis, Bloomberg contributor and Partner at Stone Court Capital, Frank Maisano, Partner at Bracewell’s Policy Resolution Group, and Rep. Bruce Westerman, a Republican representing the 4th District of Arkansas.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
